summary: Reviewed backend completion report. Frontend already wired to new endpoints; no code changes this turn. Next suggested steps: consume unread_count/mark-read in notifications, show new dashboard metrics, handle backend 422 codes (cancellation_window_passed, slot_unavailable with available_slots) and use new wallet transactions endpoint if not already.
